title: The Odyssey
creator_credit: Roz Phillips and Burbank Films Australia
brief_description: This adaptation of Homer’s classic tale “The Odyssey” is designed for children. Odysseus’s classic adventures include his encounter with the Cyclops and his experiences in the land of the Lotus Eaters where his crew succumb to a strange lethargy. After ten years of wandering the seas in order to return to his island home of Ithica, Odysseus finds that all is not well in his kingdom on his return.
